term.title: anti-Compton γ-ray spectrometer

item.text: A gamma-ray spectrometer in which the effect of the Compton scattering is at least partly compensated.

sources.item: PAC, 1982, 54, 1533. 'Glossary of terms used in nuclear analytical chemistry (Provisional)' on page 1543 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198254081533)
